dao.name: GET_MIDDLE_TYP_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) from hkproduct_rf where athena_id= :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and middle_typ = :middle_typ and rownum =1

dao.name: GET_SMALL_TYP_COUNT
dao.statement: select count(*) from hkproduct_rf where athena_id= :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and small_typ = :small_typ and rownum =1
